name: Task Donegeon 2.0 - 0.5.52 - Math Muncher Expansion
description: This major update adds the 'Math Muncher' minigame, a full-featured educational game with a curriculum for grades 1-6 and dozens of unique, auto-generated challenges. Gameplay includes power-ups collected with a 'Munch' action, varied enemy AI patterns, and a polished UI that provides clear feedback for any earnable rewards. A stability issue causing crashes when the player is hit has been addressed.
